en.manyAttack: (Press 'h' as many times as there are enemies to attack.)
en.proOne: [Prolouge] When the was founded; there existed four elements -Fire, Earth, Water, and Air.
en.proTwo: These elements formed each their own kingdoms.
en.proThree: In Happiness they formed Life, and in war, Death.
en.proFour: Whilst the Kingdom of Death is active, the kings will slowly loose their power, until death.
en.proFive: As a result, the King of Life felt powerful, so much power he became corrupt with it.
en.proSix: The corruption spread like a disease, infecting the citizens, and the land.
en.proSeven: The kings of Fire, Earth, Water, and Air faced the corrupt king,
en.proEight: They fought valiantly, but succumbed to the corruption.
en.oneFour: I can lead you no further.
en.oneFive: Enter the gates, and find Luke.
en.oneSix: He can help you better than I can.
en.oneSeven: Oh, and Good Luck, You'll need it.
en.oneNine: [You] I am but a lowly pesant.
en.oneTwelve: I wish only to reunite the kingdoms.
en.oneNineteen: but take away a letter, and I'm even,
en.lexionCorrectTwo: You have the brains, and the King has the brawns.
en.lexionCorrectThree: Brains always win. You may enter.
en.lexionIncorrectTwo: If I were wise, I'd kill you now,
en.lexionIncorrectThree: but I'll let you live, because I belive in what you are trying to do.
en.twoFive: The one to reunite the kingdoms?
en.twoSeven: [Luke] Then I wish to assist you on your journey.
en.twoNine: The powerful sword and shield of the Warrior?
en.twoEleven: The magical wand of a Mage?
en.twoTwelve: Maybe the essence of a Necromancer will suit you.
en.twoFourteen: Hey, could I ask you to do a favor for me?
en.twoFifteen: My friend, Bob, is being held prisoner by some corrupted civilians,
en.twoSixteen: Could you save him for me?
en.twoEighteen: [Corrupt Citizen] Nothing For You To Seeeeeeeeee...
en.twoTwenty: [Corrupt Citizen] Please Assume The Party Escort Submission Position...
en.twoTwentyOne: [Corrupt Civilian] Place Your Weapon On The Ground, And Lay Face Down With Your Arms At Your Side...
en.twoTwentyFive: [You] You're safe now, walk and follow me.
en.twoThirty: I hate to ask of you another favor...
en.twoThirtyTwo: [Luke] The Blacksmith's house is consumed by corruption,
en.threeLevel: Level III: The Lava Reactor Guardians
en.threeThree: [Blacksmith] Hello? Thank God someone has come to save me.
en.threeFour: I have been stuck here since the corruption had consumed the land.
en.threeFive: [You] Hold on, I'll set you free...
en.threeSeven: Because you assisted me, I shall return the favor.
en.threeEight: I will forge any gear you need,
en.threeNine: There is a catch though, you need to restart the Lava Reactor
en.threeTwelve: [You] I fail to see where that is your business.
en.threeThirteen: [Lava Reactor Guardian] I suppose it is not,
en.threeFourteen: The real question is what you want, and what banner do you fly?
en.threeFifteen: [You] I'll anwser only if you anwser first.
en.threeSixteen: [Lava Reactor Guardian] We guard the Lava Reactor,
en.threeThirtyTwo: You're ready to fight the corrupt king
en.fourTwo: [Flame Guardian] Leave now, if you value life.
en.fourSix: [Flame Guardian] Don't Tell Me What To Do.
en.fourEight: and now, I'm telling you to DIE
en.fourThirteen: [You] What is that? The Third time I have heard that today?
en.fourEighteen: [Flame Guardian] Five of our men have fallen.
en.fourTwentyTwo: [You] Okay, time to climb the 72 flights of-
en.fourTwentySeven: I understand, let's get on with it.
en.fourThirtyTwo: [Flame Guardian] The first thing you'll loose is your feet below the knees,
en.fourThirtyFour: I'm just going to kill them.
en.fourThirtyFive: [You] As I was saying. Time to climb the 72 flights of stairs
en.fourThirtySix: [You] Alright, time to climb the 72 flights of stairs
en.fourThirtyEight: [Fire King] That 'hero' made it 60 flights of stairs?
en.fourForty: [You] The torch fell, and burned away the stairs!
en.fourFortyOne: I'll have to find some other way to get up to the top of the tower.
en.fourFortySeven: It's a portal, you throw this down and think of where you want to be.
en.fourFifty: You need to be relitivly close, try as far up the stairs you can go.
en.fourFiftyTwo: [You] I need to think of where I want to be...
en.fourFailTwo: Guess I have to climb up the side.
en.fourFailFour: [Fire King] Not A Great Entrance, I'd say.
en.fiveThree: [Fire King] I say the same to you.
en.fiveFour: (FIGHTING: YOU WILL ANWSER A RIDDLE. CORRECT ANWSER WILL DEAL DAMAGE.
en.fiveFive: (THE KING WILL DO LIKEWISE UNTIL SOMEONE DIES)
en.fiveRiddleOne: [Riddle] What can you hold in your right hand, but not in your left?
en.fiveRiddleTwo: [Riddle] David's father has three sons: Snap, Crackle, and...
en.fiveTen: You were corrupted by the King of Life's arrogance.
en.fiveEleven: I am on a quest to defend the world from his heinousness.
en.fiveThirteen: [You] I need access to the Earth Kingdom...
